channel.title: CVE Feed for BUFFALO INC. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BUFFALO INC. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0555|2024-08-05T03:28:11.103Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wzr-1750dhp2
item.description: Buffer overflow in Buffalo WZR-1750DHP2 Ver.2.30 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted file.

item.title: CVE-2018-0556|2024-08-05T03:28:11.139Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wzr-1750dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WZR-1750DHP2 Ver.2.30 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0522|2024-08-05T03:28:11.098Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffer overflow in Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted file.

item.title: CVE-2018-0523|2024-08-05T03:28:11.129Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0554|2024-08-05T03:28:11.097Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wzr-1750dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WZR-1750DHP2 Ver.2.30 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the device via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0521|2024-08-05T03:28:11.054Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the device via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-23486|2024-07-05T15:05:31.047Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wsr-2533dhp
item.description: Plaintext storage of a password issue exists in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the product's login page may obtain configured credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-23486|2024-04-15T10:50:01.778Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wsr-2533dhp
item.description: Plaintext storage of a password issue exists in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the product's login page may obtain configured credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-26023|2024-04-15T10:51:04.093Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wcr-1166ds
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers allows a logged-in user to execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-26023|2024-07-15T16:10:17.826Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wcr-1166ds
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers allows a logged-in user to execute arbitrary OS commands.
